detaileddescription.para: The Character's current Health (a data structure inheriting from GameState)
The Character's current Damage (a data structure inheriting from GameState)

memberdef.argsstring: (const AssetFile &imageFile, float sizeModifier, const Position< float > &loc, string name, Reaction reaction, DoA alive, CharacterState state, unsigned health, unsigned damage, bool monitorVelocity)
memberdef.name: Character

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a Character based on the arguments given

parameterdescription.para: Whether this Character is dead or alive
The Damage capability of this Character

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a randomized Character. The client has to option to simply leave the argument randSeed as 0, in which case the constructor will generate its own random number.

parameterdescription.para: A seed to initialize the random number generator
The right hand side argument (which will be copied)
The right hand side argument (which will be moved)

detaileddescription.para: Overloads operator() for Character. Possibly will be used to call notify(). TBD.
Overloads the overload of operator(). The actual implementation and uses for this are still undecided.
Another class with a reference to this Character can call this to have the Character perform some function, as yet undecided. TBI.
A Character can use this function to pass messages to another.
Writes a formatted text description of this Character into the desired output stream
Each GameObject can implement this to enable its default behaviors to run on a loop on a separate thread

simplesect.para: a read-only value representing Character's damage

briefdescription.para: A class which serves as the basic template for just about any person in the game world, whether player or npc.
